Description: Validate Lite Recharge request (LRC) with all correct details.
Validate Lite Recharge request (LRC) mandatory parameters.
Validate that only a single IN hit happens during recharge for topup i.e no validation IN hit.
Check invalid sender msisdn should show error
Check invalid pin should show error
Check invalid receiver  should show error
Check invalid amount  should show error
Check invalid sender language  should show error
Check invalid receiver language  should show error
Check invalid sub service selector should show error
Check invalid service class should show error

(LRC) optional parameters.
